swiftsolutions.taskscheduler.branchandbound

Class BNBSchedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • swiftsolutions.taskscheduler.branchandbound.BNBSchedule

  • public class BNBSchedule
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a schedule optimized for branch and bound.
